script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_agreement_effective_date AS SELECT DISTINCT f.amp_activity_id, ag.effective_date as effective_date, ag.id, (ag.title::text || ' - '::text) || ag.code::text AS "Agreement Title + Code", ag.code AS "Agreement Code", o.name AS "Donor Agency" FROM amp_agreement ag, amp_funding f, amp_organisation o WHERE f.agreement=ag.id AND f.amp_donor_org_id = o.amp_org_id AND ag.effective_date IS NOT NULL;
